briefTitle: Extracellular Vesicles in Breast Cancer Patientsin Undergone Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy
officialTitle: Extracellular Vesicles as a Diagnostic and Prognostic Biomarker of Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy (NAC) in Breast Cancer Patients.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Signing of a specific informed consent for participation to the study
* Female sex

BC patients:

* Diagnosis of breast cancer
* Any TNM stage
* Indication to neoadjuvant chemotherapy after multidisciplinary discussion

Healthy controls:

• Patients with a negative mammography, breast ultrasound or clinical breast evaluation within 12 months of the study enrolment

Exclusion Criteria:

BC patients:

• Indication to upfront surgery

Healthy controls:

• Diagnosis of breast cancer
